perturbation.original_text: WHEREAS, the company is in the business of designing and marketing quality men's and women's golf and active sportswear under the Haley label and desires to obtain the services of the Professional in endorsing, promoting and publicizing the Company and Haley apparel;
perturbation.changed_text: WHEREAS, the corporation is in the business of designing and marketing quality men's and women's golf and active sportswear under the Haley label and desires to obtain the services of the Professional in endorsing, promoting and publicizing the Sport-Haley, Inc. and Haley apparel;
perturbation.explanation: The term 'company' is replaced with 'corporation' without defining if they are interchangeable. It creates uncertainty if the obligations extends to the corporation or only the company, which is Sport-Haley, Inc.

perturbation.original_text:
1.   SERVICES OF THE PROFESSIONAL.  The Professional agrees to perform the          following services during the term of this Agreement:

              a.  The Professional agrees that, with respect to men's apparel,          he will exclusively endorse and use exclusively in play, practice,           exhibits, clinics and other events open to the media or public, Haley           brand apparel which shall consist of shirts, vests, jackets, sweaters,          pants and shorts (if permitted by applicable rules).

              b.  The Professional grants to the Company the exclusive worldwide          right and license to use his name, autograph, likeness, photographs,          electronic media depiction, signature and any other words, symbols or          depiction's which would identify the Professional to the public in           connection with the advertising, promotion, publicizing, sale and           distribution of Haley apparel by the Company.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.   SERVICES OF THE Professional Athlete.  The Professional agrees to perform the          following services during the term of this Agreement:

              a.  The Professional agrees that, with respect to men's apparel,          he will exclusively endorse and use exclusively in play, practice,           exhibits, clinics and other events open to the media or public, Haley           brand apparel which shall consist of shirts, vests, jackets, sweaters,          pants and shorts (if permitted by applicable rules).

              b.  The Professional grants to the Corporation the exclusive worldwide          right and license to use his name, autograph, likeness, photographs,          electronic media depiction, signature and any other words, symbols or          depiction's which would identify the Professional to the public in           connection with the advertising, promotion, publicizing, sale and           distribution of Haley apparel by the Sport-Haley, Inc.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Professional' is changed to 'Professional Athlete' in the title, but not in the body, creating an ambiguity. Also, 'Company' is replaced with 'Corporation' and 'Sport-Haley, Inc.' in section 1.b. leading to confusion about whether the company or the corporation has the usage rights.

perturbation.original_text: 14.  DISPUTES. In the event of any dispute which arises between the parties          and which relates to the subject matter of this Agreement, the parties          acknowledge and agree that any such dispute shall be submitted for           binding arbitration in accordance with the arbitration procedures           established by the American arbitration Association in Denver,           Colorado.  If such association is not then in existence, an           independent association of arbitrators may be utilized  which is           designated by agreement of the parties. In the event the parties are           unable to agree on an independent association of arbitrators, either           party may apply to a court of competent jurisdiction for appointment          of arbitrators.
perturbation.changed_text: 14.  DISPUTES. In the event of any claim which arises between the parties          and which relates to the subject matter of this Agreement, the parties          acknowledge and agree that any such dispute shall be submitted for           mediation in accordance with the arbitration procedures           established by the American arbitration Association in Denver,           Colorado.  If such association is not then in existence, an           independent association of mediators may be utilized  which is           designated by agreement of the parties. In the event the parties are           unable to agree on an independent association of arbitrators, either           party may apply to a court of competent jurisdiction for appointment          of arbitrators.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'dispute' and 'claim', 'arbitration' and 'mediation', and 'arbitrators' and 'mediators' are used interchangeably without defining if they refer to the same entity. The text initially refers to 'arbitration' but then mentions 'mediation', creating an uncertainty about which conflict resolution is applicable.
